name: The Town of Beacon
description:
I heard a crashing sound coming from the North.

I had heard rumours about the Northern town, Beacon.

I went to Investigate.

The Town of Beacon is a short experience centered around a small town with big secrets. Within the experience, there are many hidden messages that help to piece together the narrative, so look closely and listen carefully. This project was originally created for a school assignment and assembled in 10 weeks.

To check out my other work go to https://jonahdlovell.wixsite.com/jonahdlovell.
